TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridItem extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class DataGridItem Inherits TableRow Implements IDataItemContainer
public ref class DataGridItem : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableRow, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer

summary.span: 代表 控制項中的項目 (資料列)。

span.span: Represents an item (row) in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件表示的項目 （資料列）控制項，例如頁首區段，頁尾區段或資料列。A object represents an item (row) in a control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data row. 資料項目的控制會儲存在集合，可以使用來存取屬性控制項。The data items of a control are stored in a collection that can be accessed by using the property of the control. 您可以使用物件來以程式設計方式存取的屬性中的項目控制項。You can use a object to programmatically access the properties of an item in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要顯示在每個資料項目的內容物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display the contents of each data item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)]

public: DataGridItem(int itemIndex, int dataSetIndex, System::Web::UI::WebControls::ListItemType itemType);

param.name: itemIndex
param.span: 控制項中 集合的項目索引。

span.span: The index of the item from the collection in the control.

param.name: dataSetIndex
param.span: 項目的索引編號，在繫結的資料來源 (出現於 控制項) 中。

span.span: The index number of the item, from the bound data source, that appears in the control.
One of the values.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. summary.span: 取得或設定資料項目，其由 控制項中的 物件所表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the data item represented by the object in the control.

value.span: ，表示 控制項中的資料項目。

span.span: A that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定項目表示之資料的屬性物件存放至控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the properties of a data item represented by the object in the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property applies only to data items in the control. 屬性必須設定為`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要顯示之資料項目的內容屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the contents of the data items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得繫結資料來源中 物件的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the object from the bound data source.

value.span: 繫結資料來源中的 索引。

span.span: The index of the from the bound data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要取得之索引的屬性繫結的資料來源的物件。Use the property to get the index of the object from the bound data source. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property applies only to data items in the control. 屬性物件必須設為`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的索引繫結的資料來源的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index of the object from the bound data source. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItem.DataSetIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataSetIndex Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItem.DataSetIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataSetIndex Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 從 控制項的 集合中，取得 物件的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the object from the collection of the control.

value.span: 控制項之 集合中 的索引。

span.span: The index of the from the collection of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷索引物件從集合控制項。Use the property to determine the index of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property applies only to data items in the control. 屬性物件必須設為`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的索引物件從集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.ItemIndex Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.ItemIndex Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType ItemType

summary.span: 取得項目的類型，這項目為 控制項中的 物件所表示。

span.span: Gets the type of the item represented by the object in the control.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷型別中的項目控制項。Use the property to determine the type of an item in the control. 下表列出各種項目類型。The following table lists the various item types. |項目類型Item Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|標題區段控制項。The heading section of the control.| |`Footer`|頁尾區段控制項。The footer section of the control.| |`Item`|中的項目控制項。An item in the control.| |`AlternatingItem`|中的交替項目控制項。An alternating item in the control.| |`SelectedItem`|在選取的項目控制項。The selected item in the control.| |`EditItem`|在 編輯選取的項目控制項。The item selected for editing in the control.| |`Separator`|項目之間的分隔符號控制項。A separator between the items of the control.| |`Pager`|頁面的選取項目區段的控制項。The page selection section of the control.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷型別中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of an item in the control. 在建立項目順序項目類型以及顯示控制項。The order in which items are created in the control is displayed along with the item type. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 這個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)]
